I think McGonagall as the Vice-President of Hogwarts is a fantastic idea. I mean, can you imagine having a Transfiguration expert like her in charge? She's always been so intelligent and level-headed, I'm sure she'd make an excellent leader. The students would really look up to her, and I think it would be amazing to see her work with the professors to create a more inclusive and supportive environment for everyone at the school.
